jokes.joke: A man is smoking a cigarette and blowing smoke rings into the air. His girlfriend becomes irritated with the smoke and says "Can't you see the warning on the cigarette pack? Smoking is hazardous to your health!" to which the man replies, "I am a programmer.  We don't worry about warnings; we only worry about errors."

Setup: What do you call a developer who doesn't comment code?
Delivery: A developer.

Setup: Why does no one like SQLrillex?
Delivery: He keeps dropping the database.

Four engineers get into a car. The car won't start.
The Mechanical engineer says "It's a broken starter".
The Electrical engineer says "Dead battery".
The Chemical engineer says "Impurities in the gasoline".
The IT engineer says "Hey guys, I have an idea: How about we all get out of the car and get back in".
Debugging: Removing the needles from the haystack.
Java is like Alzheimer's, it starts off slow, but eventually, your memory is gone.

Have a great weekend!
I hope your code behaves the same on Monday as it did on Friday.
Debugging is like being the detective in a crime movie where you're also the murderer at the same time.
Algorithm: A word used by programmers when they don't want to explain how their code works.

Setup: Why did the functional programmer get thrown out of school?
Delivery: Because he refused to take classes.
